summary: Create a simple, educational, professional website for Manthan Academy (a coaching institute) featuring teacher Digvijay Karn and offerings for CBSE students, spoken English, and English grammar.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal academic logo mark with book + pen motif, clean vector-like style, transparent background (manthan-academy-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide classroom/learning themed hero illustration, modern flat style, warm neutral palette (manthan-hero-illustration.dim_1600x700.png)

existing_features.title: Create a simple, educational, professional marketing website for the coaching institute “Manthan Academy” with clear branding and content in English.
Implement a coherent visual theme and UI system (colors, typography, spacing, components) suitable for an educational institute, and apply it consistently across all pages.
Add a top navigation header and footer with working internal links for: Home, About Teacher, Courses, and Contact.
Create a Home page that introduces Manthan Academy and the main offerings (CBSE support, Spoken English, English Grammar) with a professional hero section and concise call-to-action to contact.

Create an About Teacher page featuring the teacher profile: name “Digvijay Karn”, role as teacher at Manthan Academy, and a short professional bio focused on teaching CBSE and English (spoken + grammar).
Create a Courses page that clearly presents course categories (CBSE Support, Spoken English, English Grammar) with brief descriptions and a simple structure (cards/sections).

Create a Contact page with a simple contact section and a basic contact form that works without external services (e.g., mailto link or on-screen message), including placeholders for phone/email/address if not provided.
Add required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and display them in the UI (logo in header/footer; hero visual on Home/About).

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a simple, educational, professional website for Manthan Academy (coaching institute) highlighting teacher Digvijay Karn and courses (CBSE, spoken English, English grammar).
